SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.runner
Annotation Type WebDriverConfiguration

@Documented
@Inherited
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
@SeleniumConfiguration
public @interface WebDriverConfiguration

WebDriverConfiguration defines class-level meta-data which can be used to instruct client code with regard to use a Selenium web driver.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Brian Matthews

Optional Element Summary
 Class<? extends org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver>[] baseDrivers
          The web drivers used to launch the tests.
 

baseDrivers

public abstract Class<? extends org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver>[] baseDrivers
The web drivers used to launch the tests. By default we just run with HTML Unit.

Default:
org.openqa.selenium.htmlunit.HtmlUnitDriver.class
